content: **materials ** - 1 - 50g ball of black 4 ply knitting worsted - 2 - 50g ball of white 4 ply knitting worsted **designer s note ** size is for a foot length of 9 to 10 inches i don t have time right now to do patterns for different sizes so i would suggest for larger sneakers use a larger hook size i wouldn t go any larger than a size 6 00 mm j-10 us for smaller slippers use a smaller hook i wouldn t go any smaller than 3 75 f-5 us as it may be too difficult to work with you could try a sportweight yarn with a smaller hook for even smaller sizes *update * - i made a pair with a 4 00mm hook and they fit a foot length of 8 inches
